title.title: Past experience
title.content: On this page you are going to be able to read all past working experiences i have had in the last years

items.title: Working history
items.content:
In the past 5 years i have been working in a bunch of different working places. One of them being a volunteer at a petting zoo, it was a really fun job i did back when i was really young
 it helped me learn the basics of being an employee and i got to work with really sweet animals!

After the petting zoo i got a job at a supermarket, that being Dekamarkt Blokker. I have worked there for almost 4 years and managed to build a great bond with some really friendly co-workers!

items.title: Petting zoo
items.content:
Volunteer at petting zoo, fed all the animals and
 made sure they had a clean place to sleep

items.title: Dekamarkt Blokker
items.content: I make sure the store is stocked up with products

items.title: Full-time student
items.content: I study code to build kick-ass programs!!

items.title: Edulock CEO
items.content: CEO, Software developer and team manager

items.title: De Waalrakkers
items.text: Here you have one of the animals i took care of while being a volunteer here.

items.title: Dekamarkt Blokker
items.text: Dekamarkt is a dutch supermarket chain that ive worked for

items.title: Awsome full-time student
items.text: Im working hard to end up with a master diploma in Applied Artificial Intelligence

items.title: Start-up CEO
items.text: I came up with a great company idea and together with a great team we managed to build a nice foundation from the ground up
